original_text: So Ezra rose up and put the leading priests and Levites and all Israel under oath to do what had been suggested. And they took the oath.
korean_text: 이에 에스라가 일어나 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 온 이스라엘에게 이 말대로 행하기를 맹세하게 하매 무리가 맹세하는지라

sentences.original_text: and put the leading priests and Levites and all Israel
under oath to do what had been suggested
